content:
Alya Abbott said:

Tim Abbott said:

We should definitely add a way to filter by stream in "Recent topics" regardless, just as a natural extension of that feature. I think the main thing we need for that is to find space for the UI control.

We could have a filter icon next to the Streams header?

I'm splitting off this thread because I think it's worth discussing how to implement a stream filter in Recent topics.

If we use a filter icon next to the Streams header, how would we want to display the search box so that it looks nice?

Also, we should think about a consistent UI for filtering streams and filtering topics.
I think simplest would be to shrink the "Filter topics" search box and have a "Filter streams" dropdown_list_widget where you can select a set of streams sit to its left.
(I haven't checked whether we'd have space for that all screen widths, but it seems plausible aside from mobile web, where we might shift to a 2-line heading area or something)
Hmm, thinking more about it, would there be a way to filter down to mulitple streams you want to keep an eye on?
Yeah; that's why I proposed it a "set of streams" rather than a single one.
I see, sure. Would it be useful to allow multiple topics too?
Idunno, I think the "Filter topics" widget is likely to be used to find a specific topic; I'd leave that out of scope since I'm not sure what the use case would be.
(That said, do in some of our filter widgets support , for an OR gate of multiple search keys)
